        public static com.google.common.base.Optional<java.net.InetSocketAddress> extractNetconfServerAddress(org.osgi.framework.BundleContext context,
                                                                                      NetconfConfigUtil.InfixProp infixProp)
        Parameters:
        context - from which properties are being read.
        infixProp - either tcp or ssh
        Returns:
        value if address and port are present and valid, Optional.absent otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if address or port are invalid, or configuration is missing
